sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; import React, { useEffect } from "react" import Homepage from "./pages/homepage/Homepage" import Header from "./component/header/Header" import Footer from "./component/footer/Footer" import { Switch, Route, Redirect } from "react-router-dom" import ShopPage from "./pages/shop-page/ShopPage" import AccountPage from "./pages/account-page/AccountPage" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { checkUserSession } from "./redux/user/user.actions" import { selectError } from "./redux/user/user.selectors" import { Alert } from 'reactstrap'; function App() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const error = useSelector(state => selectError(state)) useEffect(() => { dispatch(checkUserSession()) }, [dispatch]) return
{error}
} export default App;
